rendertweaks.enable-chroma.description: Enables a rainbow/chroma effect. Disregards the solid color provided above.
rendertweaks.saturation.description: Saturation value for the chroma effect.
rendertweaks.brightness.description: Brightness value for the chroma effect.
rendertweaks.alpha.description: Alpha value for the chroma effect.
rendertweaks.speed.description: Speed value for the chroma effect.
rendertweaks.world-border.stationary.dis: Completely removes stationary world border visually.
rendertweaks.world-border.shrinking.disa: Completely removes shrinking world border visually.
rendertweaks.world-border.growing.disabl: Completely removes growing world border visually.
